title: Angel Witch - Screaming  N' Bleedin  mp3  320k  a2k
description:
Angel Witch - Screaming  N' Bleedin  mp3  320k  a2k What we got.....Screamin' 'n' Bleedin' is the second album by British heavy metal band Angel Witch. The album was released in 1985 through Killerwatt Records.[1] Even though this is the second release of the band, it is the first release with the new line-up of 1984, after the split-up in 1981.

In 2004, the album was re-issued by Archaic Temple Productions and included three live bonus tracks and new cover art.[4]
